amendment.description: Amendment sought to protect commercial, recreational and subsistence fisheries from the negative impacts of unregulated discharge.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 230 (Roll no. 280).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Huffman.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 230 (Roll no. 280).
